inclusion.criterion: Localized acquired hypomelanosis secondary to any insult, post-inflammatory or iatrogenic of no more than 2 years duration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients older than 18 years old, consenting to go through the microneedling procedure.
